name: My Friend the Reaper
description:
This game is still in development. The first chapter is playable here on itch. Please give me some feedback, to help me improve the game :)

My Friend the Reaper is a fast paced arcade style roguelite in which you can pay the Reaper coins for an instant resurrection. The same coins are also used for buying items to build powerful synergies. 


Use items to your advantage! Explosive arrows make your arrows hit more than one enemy.


Freeze enemies and hit them to launch them. Even the bosses.

Combine items to create devastating synergies.

My Friend the Reaper - Features:
  • A challenging fast paced roguelite 
  • Create your own character build throughout the run, using powerful items with lots of synergies.
  • Fast arcade style combat with with instant respawns
  • The coins you use for buying items are also used to pay the Reaper for a quick resurrection. Basically coins are your extra lives. If you can't pay up it's game over. You can spend souls you collected during the run, to unlock new items.
  • Almost everything in the level can be destroyed for coins, items or secret passages.
